data.title: Who is Alexandra Kay's husband? Did she divorce Indiana Touchette?
data.meta_description: Find out who Alexandra Kay's husband was. The article narrates her dating life with Indiana Touchette and explores the career of the man she is dating.
data.text:
Alexandra Kay, an American country singer-songwriter, has amassed a sizable fanbase since she hit the limelight in 2016 with her debut single, No More. Besides her songs, her love life has also made headlines severally, with many seeking to know Alexandra Kay's husband. The singer addressed rumors about her divorce for the first time in October 2023 through her debut album, All I've Ever Known.

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Profile summary

Who is Alexandra Kay's husband?

Who is Alexandra Kay's ex-husband?

Indiana Touchette and Alexandra Kay's relationship history

When did Alexandra Kay get divorced?

Who is Alexandra Kay's dating?

Who is Rocko Beall?

Where is Rocko Beall from?

A glimpse into Rocko Beall's career

Is Alexandra Kay married?

Facts about Alexandra Kay's ex-husband, Indiana Touchette

At 22, Kay debuted her solo country music career, producing cover videos of the '90s hit tunes and sharing them on her Facebook fan page, where they went viral several times. Since then, the public has always expressed interest in her career progress and love life. For this reason, this article is the last update about Alexandra Kay's relationships.

Profile summary

Full nameAlexandra Lexi KrekorianStage nameAlexandra KayGenderFemaleBirthdate5 September 1991Age32 years (as of June 2024)Zodiac signVirgoBirthplace Chesterfield, Missouri, USA Raised atWaterloo, Illinois, USAResidenceWaterloo, Illinois, USANationalityAmericanEthnicityWhiteReligionChristianitySexualityStraightHeight5'5" (165 cm)Hair colorBrunetteEye colorBrownMarital statusDivorcedFormer spouseIndiana TouchetteAlma materWaterloo High SchoolProfessionSinger-songwriterNet worth$1 million (approx.)TikTok @alexandrakaymusic X (Formerly Twitter)@_alexandrakayInstagram @alexandrakaymusicFacebook@alexandrakaymusicYouTube

Who is Alexandra Kay's husband?

American singer Alexandra Kay is not married but has moved on with a new man. A year has passed since her first marriage ended. Kay was quiet throughout her divorce and decided to write about her feelings in her debut album, All I've Ever Known, which came out in 2023.

Who is Alexandra Kay's ex-husband?

Alexandra married her longtime boyfriend, Indiana Touchette, an American union laborer, on 25 September 2021, after dating for over ten years.

Indiana Touchette and Alexandra Kay's relationship history

Touchette and Kay are from neighboring small towns (Waterloo and Millstadt, respectively) in Southern Illinois. The two reportedly met in high school but went on their first official date in 2012 after high school.

Singer Alexandra said:

I remember exactly what he was wearing. He pulled up, and his car was super clean. We went to the movies, and I made fun of him for eating cookies.

The two moved in together after just three months. Touchette said:

It was a learning curve, both of our first time out of the house — we were 18, 19 years old. I worked days, then she would bartend.

At that time, Alexandra had turned down college scholarships to pursue her music career and was performing in musical theater productions. She even tried her luck as an American Idol contestant in 2011.

Kay and Indiana called it quits just six months after moving in together but subsequently realized they were a perfect fit. During their separation, which lasted about a year, she wrote a song, Somewhere Near Indiana, about the breakup and her love for Touchette.

The singer landed a record deal with Network Entertainment in 2013 at age 21. At 22, she rose to stardom by making cover videos of '90s hit tunes for her Facebook fans.

Kay's fame skyrocketed while they were still together when she dropped her debut single, No More (2016). Indiana proposed around Christmas time in 2019 and married her in September 2021 at A Pocketful of Sunshine in Mt. Vernon, Illinois.

Touchette's brother-in-law, Tim Hastey, officiated the wedding, and Kay wrote a song, From September to Forever, for the event. Nonetheless, she decided not to perform it at the wedding and sang it privately for her new husband.

Alexandra released many popular tracks while married to Touchette, including her debut EP, Dive Bar Dreamer (2021), and her first radio hit, Backroad Therapy (2022).

When did Alexandra Kay get divorced?

Sources indicate that Indiana Touchette and Alexandra Kay divorced on 27 October 2022. News about their divorce emerged in January 2023 after the American singer tweeted:

I hadn't slowed down for long enough to realize I was pouring myself into someone who was never filling me back up.

Alexandra Kay's wedding ring has since been taken off, and she does not post about her husband on her social media handles as before.

After releasing her debut album, All I've Ever Known, in October 2023, the singer admitted to Music Mayhem:

Everything that I say in this music is truth. The process of actually writing the music and opening up was the easiest part of it all, because I just told my story.

Alexandra started writing songs at 13 because it was the only way to express her feelings. So, composing the 11 tracks for the album helped her heal. She said:

"All I’ve Ever Known" is that initial experience of me kind of laying in bed in my new apartment… Every house that I’ve ever bought was to fit his needs. Every place we’ve ever lived was to fit him, and so "All I’ve Ever Known" is that realization of coming into my own

Alexandra also said in the interview:

Then you have "Kiss Me Goodnight,"which is hearing about someone in your life moving on and being like, "How could you do this so fast?" and then "Painted Him Perfect" is really what kicks off the entire album, and that’s the letter to my fans.

She concluded:

I wrote through every different new emotion and new experience I’ve experienced over the last year and a half, and then we just created eleven songs out of it.

Who is Alexandra Kay's dating?

On 15 February 2024, the country music star posted pictures of her fun moments with singer Rick Beal on Valentine's and tagged his IG page in the caption. Kay wrote:

Oh how rare it is, to find someone like you. ❤️ Happy Valentine’s Day, sugar. You make me the happiest girl in the world. @rockobeall.

Who is Rocko Beall?

Anthony "Rocko" Beall is an American guitarist, songwriter, producer, and music teacher at Music Staff Studio.

Where is Rocko Beall from?

Country singer Alexandra Kay's boyfriend is from Orange County, California, but currently lives and works in Nashville, Tennessee.

A glimpse into Rocko Beall's career

According to his LinkedIn profile, Anthony "Rocko" Beall began his career with the "Hero For Today" pop/punk group. Recording and producing several albums with the band in Tommy Lee's Atrium Studio in Calabasas, California, gave him valuable production and business experience.

From there, Rocko was licensed to use his original song, Superman, in the Crowning Jules film. After releasing two EP's and several live performances throughout California, Beall switched from band to solo artist.

Anthony attended the Musicians Institute in Los Angeles, California, where he received the Independent Artist Scholarship. He also studied production and songwriting with LA's top industry professionals.

Afterward, Beall graduated from Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee, with a degree in Commercial Music: Guitar (with a Songwriting Emphasis).

Drawing inspiration from classic and contemporary artists, Rocko writes upbeat melodies that evoke strong feelings, and more people are starting to appreciate his artwork in the United States.

Is Alexandra Kay married?

The country music singer has been divorced for over a year. She is currently dating American guitarist/singer Anthony "Rocko" Beall.

Facts about Alexandra Kay's ex-husband, Indiana Touchette

Indiana Touchette's nickname is Indy.

He is about a year younger than Alexandra.

They met in high school through friends.

Touchette inspired numerous songs Alexandra Kay composed.

Kay documented their relationship’s highs and lows through her songs.

It has been confirmed that Indiana Touchette is no longer singer Alexandra Kay's husband. The couple divorced in October 2022, and Kay found love again with singer Rocko Beall.

Tuko.co.ke published Natalie Githinji's biography. The NRG Radio presenter began her career at age 23 and has become one of Kenya's most celebrated media personalities.

Besides attracting a large youth audience through her NRG Breakfast show, Natalie's YouTube and TikTok content also significantly contribute to her fame.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
